name: RECLINING_-_LOVESEAT_IVORY_BONDED_LEATHER
description: Upholstered in ivory charcoal bonded leather with generously padded head and arm rests, lumbar support and reclining mechanism, this loveseat will be the perfect addition to any entertainment area. The stich detailing and pillow top arms give this set a comfortable yet modern look that is sure to enhance your living space. Ideal for movie night, reading a book or just to kick back and relax after a long day’s work, this modular motion series was designed for ultimate comfort. Finish the look with the matching swivel glider recliner to complete the set!Furniture Pattern: SolidType: Loveseat, ReclinerMaterial: Bonded Leather, Foam, WoodStyle: Contemporary, Casual, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: IvoryColor: WhiteStyleCasual, Contemporary, TransitionalMaterialBonded Leather, Foam, WoodTypeLoveseat, ReclinerAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteFurniture PatternSolid
